# PubMed Paper Fetcher

This Python program fetches research papers from PubMed based on a user-specified query, filters papers with authors affiliated with pharmaceutical or biotech companies, and outputs the results as a CSV file.

## ðŸš€ Features
- âœ… Fetches research papers from PubMed API.
- âœ… Filters papers with authors from pharmaceutical/biotech companies.
- âœ… Saves the output as a CSV file.
- âœ… Command-line interface (CLI) built using Python argparse.
- âœ… Easy to use with Poetry for dependency management.
